V03vinv16_u:122: The story of Muktikā, the daughter of King of Siṃhala, and the portrait of the Buddha
V03vinv16_u:124: yam eva divasaṃ pratisaṃdhir gṛhītas tam eva divasaṃ muktāvarṣaṃ patitam;
V03vinv16_u:125: rājñā naimittikān āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ; te ūcuḥ: deva,
V03vinv16_u:126: asya satvasyānubhāvo yo 'yaṃ devyāḥ kukṣāv upapannaḥ iti;
V03vinv16_u:127_0: yāvad asāv upasthīyate śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair
V03vinv16_u:127_1: āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais
V03vinv16_u:127_3: apsarā iva nandanavanavicāriṇī mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantī adharāṃ bhūmiṃ,
V03vinv16_u:128: na cāsyā kiṃcid amanojñāṃ śabdaśravaṇam yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya;
V03vinv16_u:129: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv16_u:131: yam api divasaṃ jātā tam api divasaṃ muktāvarṣaṃ patitam; rājā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv16_u:132: yadi dārakāyā anubhāvān muktāvarṣaṃ nipatitam asyā eva muktā bhavantu iti;
V03vinv16_u:134: tataḥ trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyṃ vyavasthāpyate:
V03vinv16_u:135: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāma iti; amātyā kathayanti:
V03vinv16_u:136: yasmād asyāḥ puṇyānubhāvena muktāvarṣaṃ patitaṃ tasmād bhavatu dārikāyā muktā iti nāma iti;
V03vinv16_u:143: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣireṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
V03vinv16_u:144: yasā mahatī saṃvṛttā tadā svakulavaṃśānurūpeṇācāravihāreṇa sāntarjanasya rājñaḥ atyarthaṃ bahumatā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv16_u:145: yāvad apareṇa samayena śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ sāmudraṃ yānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudram avatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:147: tato bhāṇḍaṃ pratiśāmya rājakulasya nātidūre āvasitāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:148: te rātryāḥ pratyuṣasamaye udānān pārāyaṇān satyadṛśaḥ sthaviragāthāḥ sthavirīgāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi vistareṇa svādhyāyitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:151: madhyadeśābhyāgatā vaṇijaḥ śobhanam gāyante iti; rājñā amātyānām ājñā dattā:
V03vinv16_u:152: bhavanta āhūyatāṃ gāyanakāḥ iti; te āhūyata; muktikā kathatati: gāyantu bhavantaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:153: śṛṇumaḥ kīdṛśaṃ madhyadeśe gāndharvam iti; te kathayanti: devi,
V03vinv16_u:156: asmābhi rātryāḥ pratyuṣasamaye budddhavacanaṃ paṭhitam iti;
V03vinv16_u:157: muktikayā buddha iti aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny āhṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv16_u:159: bhavantaḥ ko 'yaṃ buddho nāma iti; te vistareṇa buddhamāhātmyaṃ varṇayitum ārabdhāḥ: devi,
V03vinv16_u:160: śākyānaṃ kumāra utpannaḥ anuhimatpārśve [Adhik-v_65] nadyā bhagīrathyās tīre kapilasya ṛṣer āśramapadasya nātidūre;
V03vinv16_u:162: saced gṛhī āgāram adhyāvatsyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī cāturantāṃ vijetā dharmiko dharmarājā saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ;
V03vinv16_u:163: tasya imāny evaṃrūpāṇi saptaratnāni bhaviṣyanti tadyathā cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ [A_334a] aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ ḥgṛhapatiratnaṃḥ pariṇāyakaratnam eva saptamam;
V03vinv16_u:164: pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām;
V03vinv16_u:165: sa imām eva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīm akhilām akaṇṭakām anutpātām adaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa samenābhinirjityādhyāvatsyati;
V03vinv16_u:166: sacet keśaśmaśrū avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyati tathāgato bhaviṣyaty arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vighuṣṭaśabdo loke;
V03vinv16_u:167: sa eva buddho nāma iti; muktikā kathayati:
V03vinv16_u:168: yadā yuṣmākaṃ gamanadeśakālas tadā mama nivedayiṣyatha; te kathayanti: evaṃ devi bhavatu,
V03vinv16_u:169: nivedayiṣyāmaḥ; yāvat teṣāṃ gamanadeśakālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ; tair muktikāyā
V03vinv16_u:176: atha te vaṇijas taṃ lekham ādāyānupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:178: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvāikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:180: siṃhaladvīpe bhadanta siṃhalarājño duhitayā bhagavataḥ ayaṃ lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:181: bhagavatā muktikāyā vinayakālaṃ jñātvā svayam eva gṛhītvā vācitaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:183: yadā yuṣmākaṃ punar gamanaṃ bhavati tadā mamāvedayiṣyatha;
V03vinv16_u:184: evaṃ bhadanta iti te vaṇijo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:185: tataḥ paṇyaṃ vikrīya pratipaṇyam ādāya bhagavatsākāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ; kathayanti:
V03vinv16_u:186: bhagavan vayaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ ājñāṃ prayaccha iti kim asmābhir muktikā vaktavyā iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv16_u:187: suparikarmakṛtaṃ paṭam ānayata citrakarāṃś ca iti;
V03vinv16_u:188: taiḥ paṭa upanāmitaḥ citrakarāś cāhūtāḥ; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv16_u:191: na śaknuvanti bhagavataś citrakarā anekapuṇyaśatanirjātaṃ tathāgatapratibimbakam abhinirvartitum;
V03vinv16_u:193: prabhām utsṛjāmi iti; taiḥ paṭa upanāmitaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:196: tato bhagavatā pratimāyā adhastāt trīṇi śaraṇagamanāni pañca śikṣāpadāni dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ amulomapratilomaḥ āryāṣṭāṅgaś ca mārgo likhitaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:199: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
V03vinv16_u:204: mayā muktikāyāḥ paṭe abhilikhitaṃ prābhṛtam anupreṣitam;
V03vinv16_u:205: tvayā vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe siṃhaladvīpanivāsinaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃnipatya mahatā satkāreṇāyaṃ [A_334b] paṭa udghāṭayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:207: yadi muktikā pṛcchati kim idam iti vaktavyā ayaṃ tasya bhagavato rūpakāya iti;
V03vinv16_u:209: idam adhastāt kim idam iti vaktavyā:
V03vinv16_u:210: imāni trīṇi śaraṇagamanāni pañca śikṣāpadāni anulomapratilomaḥ pratītyasamutpādo jagataḥ pravṛttir ḥnivṛttiś caḥ;
V03vinv16_u:211: ayam asyādhigama āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ iti; yadi kathayati:
V03vinv16_u:212: idam upariṣṭāt kim idam iti vaktavyā: utsāhaya,
V03vinv16_u:213: śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītvā imam anulomapratilomaṃ dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokya vīryam ārabhate;
V03vinv16_u:214: sa amṛtādhigamaṃ mārgam avāpya sarvaduḥkhād vimucyate iti;
V03vinv16_u:215: evaṃ bhadanta iti te vaṇijo bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:216: tataḥ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanāḥ siṃhaladvīpagamanīyaṃ paṇyam ādāya anupūrveṇa siṃhaladvīpam anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:220_0: vācayitvā tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallakaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
V03vinv16_u:222: tato mahatā satkāreṇa nagaramadhye catūratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya paṭa udghāṭitaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:223: mahājanakāyena namo buddhāya namo buddhāya ity uccair nādo muktaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:224: tato muktikā rājakumārī tīvraprasādāvarjitahṛdayā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā pādayor nipatya tān vaṇijaḥ pṛcchati;
V03vinv16_u:226: te ākhyātum ārabdhāḥ: idaṃ tasya bhagavato rūpakāyaḥ; idam adhastāt kim?
V03vinv16_u:228: anulomapratilomaḥ pratītyasamutpādo jagataḥ pravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś ca;
V03vinv16_u:231: śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītvā imam anulomapratilomaṃ dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokya vīryam ārabhate,
V03vinv16_u:232: sa amṛtādhigamaṃ mārgam avāpya sarvaduḥkhād vimucyate iti;
V03vinv16_u:233: tato muktikā dvādśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ anulomapratilomam cintayitum ārabdhā yāvat triparivartaṃ na karoti;
V03vinv16_u:234: tāvat tayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavrajeṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam;
V03vinv16_u:235: sā dṛṣṭasatyā gāthā bhāṣate dūrasthitena buddhena prajñācakṣur viśodhitaḥ /
V03vinv16_u:239: iti; gāthā bhāṣitvā tān vaṇijān idam avocat:

V03vinv16_u:524: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhikṣavaḥ katibhir adhikaraṇaśamathair dharmair damayitavyaṃ śamayitavyaṃ vyupaśamayitavyam?
V03vinv16_u:527: kathaṃ saṃmukhavinaya adhikaraṇaśamatho bhavati kathaṃ caiṣām adhikaraṇānām damaś ca bhavati śamaś ca vyupaśamaś ca,
V03vinv16_u:529: buddho bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ varśā upagato jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme;
V03vinv16_u:530: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapade varśā upagatāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:531: teśām antarvarṣo utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:532: tais tad adhikaraṇam āyuṣmantayoḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor upanikṣiptam;
V03vinv16_u:533: tābhyaṃ tad adhikaraṇam vyupaśamitaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:534: atha sambahulā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitās trayāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarā samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastīṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:536: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:537: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ; dharmatā khalu,
V03vinv16_u:538: buddhā bhagavantaḥ āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā pratisaṃmodate,
V03vinv16_u:539: kuto yūyaṃ bhikṣava etarhy āgacchata kutra vā varṣoṣitāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:544: janapadād vayaṃ bhadanta etarhy āgacchāmo janapade ca smo varṣā uṣitāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:545: kaccid yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sukhasparśaṃ janapade varṣā uṣitā na cāstha klāntā piṇḍakena?
V03vinv16_u:546: na hi vayam bhadanta janapade sukhasparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na ca sma klāntā piṇḍakena,
V03vinv16_u:547: api tv asmākam antarvarṣeṇa utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:548: tair asmābhis tad adhikaraṇam āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām [Adhik-v_80] upanikṣiptam;
V03vinv16_u:549: tābhyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena ca
V03vinv16_u:553: śakṣyanti bata me sthalasthāḥ śrāvakāḥ utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayituṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:554: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sthalasthair bhikṣubhir utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitavyāni dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena iti;

V03vinv16_u:562: sādhv āyuṣmantaḥ idam adhikaraṇam sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītam;

V03vinv16_u:586_1: āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām ekasmin pakṣe nātmanā upasaṃkrāmati nāpi dūtam anupreṣayati,
V03vinv16_u:587: dvitīyam api nātmanopasaṃkrāmati nāpi dūtam anupreṣayati
V03vinv16_u:588: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalastho na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:590: evaṃrūpaṃ hi sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāni cādhikaraṇāny utpadyante utpannāni ca na kṣipraṃ vyupaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:591: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśāyitavyah; tat kasya tetoḥ?
V03vinv16_u:592: evaṃrūpam api sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāny adhikaraṇāny utpadyante utpannāni ca kṣipraṃ ḥnaḥ vyupaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:593: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmataḥ saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś nāvakāśayitavyaḥ; tat kasya hetoḥ?
V03vinv16_u:594: evaṃrūpaṃ sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāny adhikaraṇāni notpadyante utpannāni ca kṣipram [Adhik-v_82] eva upaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinyena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:601: dve saṃmukhe, pudgalasaṃmukhaṃ dharmasaṃmukhaṃ ca; pudgalasaṃmukhaṃ katamat?
V03vinv16_u:603: yathā ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati sarve te samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:605: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena tena śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti;
V03vinv16_u:607: sacet sthalasthā bhikṣavaḥ tad adhikaraṇaṃ na śaknuvanti vyupaśamayituṃ tais tad adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghe upanikṣeptavyam,
V03vinv16_u:608: saṃghena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:609: saṃghena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena suvyupaśāntam
V03vinv16_u:611: Three presences: saṅgha, pudgala and dharma
V03vinv16_u:613: trīṇi saṃmukhāni: saṃghasaṃmukham, pudgalasaṃmukham, dharmasaṃmukhaṃ ca; saṃghasaṃmukhaṃ katamat?
V03vinv16_u:614: yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:616: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃukhībhūtā na prativahanti na pratikrośanti;
V03vinv16_u:617: yeṣāṃ prativahatāṃ pratikrośatāṃ pratikrośo ārohati ḥkarmāṇi ca kurvantiḥ idam ucyate saṃghasaṃmukham;
V03vinv16_u:619: ye tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti yeṣāṃ ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati te sarve samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtā;
V03vinv16_u:622: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena ḥtenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti,
V03vinv16_u:624: [A_340a] sacet saṃghaḥ na śaknoti tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayituṃ tataḥ ḥpaścātḥ saṃghena vyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃmantavyāḥ daśa vā pañca vā;
V03vinv16_u:626: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite pūrvaṃ tāvad utsāhayitavyāḥ:
V03vinv16_u:627: utsahadhve yūyaṃ buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ santo bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitum iti;
V03vinv16_u:628: saced utsahante tair vaktavyam utsahayāma iti;
V03vinv16_u:629: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyaṃ:
V03vinv16_u:630: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmaḥdattaḥsaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ utsahante bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:631: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣameta anujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṅgho buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmanyeta;
V03vinv16_u:632: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante saṃghasya bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum; eṣā jñaptiḥ,
V03vinv16_u:634: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante bahiḥ sīkmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:636: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenāḥ vyūḍhakā bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayiṣyanti;
V03vinv16_u:637: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmantum:

V03vinv16_u:1221: api tu vaiśālikair bhikṣubhir acodayitvā asmārayitvā balād utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kṛtam iti;

V03vinv16_u:1307: ihaikeṣām adhikaraṇānāṃ damaś ca bhavati śamaś ca vyupaśamaś ca yaduta tatsvabhāvaiṣīyena adhikaraṇaśamathena?
V03vinv16_u:1308: iha hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti; avajñāya pratijānāti,
V03vinv16_u:1309: pratijñāya punar apy ajānāti; etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti; bhagavān āha:

V03vinv16_u:1311_0: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe
V03vinv16_u:1311_1: saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ḥhastakena bhikṣuṇā ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yathāvṛddhikayā
V03vinv16_u:1311_2: sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā utkuṭukena sthitvā idaṃ syād vacanīyam:
V03vinv16_u:1313: mayā hastakena bhikṣuṇā saṃghamadhye āpattir avajñātaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1315: pratijñāya punar apy avajñātaḥ; so 'haṃ saṃghāt tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ yāce,
V03vinv16_u:1316: dadatu bhadantāḥ saṃgho me hastakasya bhikṣos tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv16_u:1317: evaṃ dvir apy evaṃ trir api;
V03vinv16_u:1318: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam;
V03vinv16_u:1320: ayaṃ hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti avajñāya pratijānāti [Adhik-v_107] pratijñāya punar apy avajānāti;
V03vinv16_u:1321: ḥayaṃ hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghāt tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ yācate;
V03vinv16_u:1322: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaḥ hastakasya bhikṣoḥ tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dadyād ity eṣā jñaptiḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1325: so 'yaṃ hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti,
V03vinv16_u:1328: tat saṃgho hastakasya bhikṣos tatsvabhavaiṣīyaṃ dadāti;
V03vinv16_u:1329: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate hastakasya bhikṣos tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dātuṃ te tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv16_u:1337: tatsvabhāvaiṣīyadattakena bhikṣuṇā na pravrājayitavyaṃ nopasaṃpādayitavyaṃ na niśrayo deyo na śramaṇoddeśa upasthāpayitavyaḥ nānena karma kartavyam,
V03vinv16_u:1342: nānena bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā;
V03vinv16_u:1347: nāpi saṃghamadhye vinayo moktavyaḥ satsv anyeṣu vinayadhareṣu pudgaleṣu;
V03vinv16_u:1348: tatsvabhāvaiṣīyadattako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikān dharmān asamādāya vartate, sātisāro bhavati
V03vinv16_u:1349: ekam adhārmikaṃ tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dānaṃ, ekaṃ dhārmikam; ekam adhārmikam katamat?

V03vinv16_u:1351: tasya saṃghaḥ svabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dadāti adhārmikaṃ tatsvabhāvaiṣīyadānam;
V03vinv16_u:1354: yathāpitat hastako bhikṣuḥ saṃghamadhye āpattim avajānāti avajñāya pratijānāti pratijñāya punar apy avajānāti tasya saṃghas [Adhik-v_108] tatsvabhāvaiṣīyaṃ dadāti,

V03vinv16_u:1359: The settling of legal questions by the trṇaprastāraka method
V03vinv16_u:1360: kathaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ tṛṇaprastāraka adhikaraṇaśamatho bhavati?
V03vinv16_u:1361: kathaṃ ca punar ihaikeṣām adhikaraṇānāṃ damaś ca bhavati śamaś ca ḥvyupaśamaśḥ yaduta tṛṇaprastārakeṇādhikaraṇaśamathena?
V03vinv16_u:1362: yathāpitad bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ viharatāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām;
V03vinv16_u:1363: ekasmin pakṣe yo bhikṣuḥ [A_349b] sthaviraḥ sthavirānyatamaḥ jñāto jñātānyatamaḥ pramukaḥ pramukhānyatamaḥ tena svapakṣe upasaṃkramya idaṃ syād vacanīyam:
V03vinv16_u:1364: teṣām asmākam āyuṣmantaḥ alābhā na lābhāḥ durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1365: ye vayaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya kalahajātā viharāmo bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1366: yāṃ cāham āyuṣmanto 'smin vastuni āpattim āpanno yāṃ ca yūyam,
V03vinv16_u:1368: utsahe 'ham ātmanaḥ karaṇīyena yuṣmākāṃ ca teṣām āyuṣmatām antike deśayitum āviṣkartuṃ na praticchādayitum iti;
V03vinv16_u:1369: sacet tasya bhikṣoḥ svapakṣād ekabhikṣur api bhāṣitaṃ na prativahati na pratikrośati,
V03vinv16_u:1370: tatas tena bhikṣuṇā dvitīyaṃ pakṣam upasaṃkramyaikāṃśam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā yathāvṛddhikayā sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā utkuṭukena sthitvā idaṃ syād vacanīyam:
V03vinv16_u:1371: teṣām asmākam āyuṣmanta alābhā na lābhāḥ durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1372: ye vayam svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya kalahajātā viharāmo bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1373: yāṃ cāham asmin vastuny āpattim āpanno yāṃ ca te āyuṣmantaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1375: utsahe 'ham ātmanaḥ karaṇīyena teṣām āyuṣmatāṃ ḥcaḥ yuṣmākam antike deśayitum āviṣkartuṃ na praticchādayitum iti;
V03vinv16_u:1376: dvitīye pakṣe ḥyoḥ bhikṣuḥ sthaviraḥ sthavirānyatamaḥ jñāto jñātānyatamaḥ pramukhaḥ pramukhānyatamaḥ tenāpi svapakṣa upasaṃkramya idaṃ syād vacanīyam:
V03vinv16_u:1377: asmākam āyuṣmantaḥ teṣāṃ ca alābhā na lābhā durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1378: ye vayaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya kalahajātā viharāmo bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādam āpannaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1379: yāṃ cāham āyuṣmanto 'smin vastuny āpattim āpanno yāṃ ca yūyam,
V03vinv16_u:1381: utsahe 'ham ātmanaḥ karaṇīyena yuṣmākaṃ ca teṣām ḥāyuṣmatāmḥ antike deśayitum āviṣkartuṃ na praticchādayitum iti;
V03vinv16_u:1382: sacet tasya bhikṣor ḥsvapakṣād ekabhikṣurḥ api bhāṣitaṃ
V03vinv16_u:1383: na prativahati na pratikrośati tatas tena bhikṣuṇā dvitīyaṃ pakṣam upasaṃkramyaikāṃśam uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā yathāvṛddhikayā sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā utkuṭukena sthitvā idaṃ syād vacanīyam:
V03vinv16_u:1384: teṣām asmākam āyuṣmanta alābhā na lābhā durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1385: ye vayaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya kalahajātā viharāmo bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādam āpannāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1386: yāṃ cāham asmin vastuny āpattim apanno yāṃ ca te āyuṣmantaḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1388: utsahe 'ham ātmanaḥ karaṇīyena teṣāṃ cāyuṣmatāṃ yuṣmākam antike deśayitum āviṣkartuṃ na praticchādayitum iti;
V03vinv16_u:1389: yadā ekapakṣo ḥdvitīyeḥ romaṃ pātayati niḥsaraṇaṃ pravartayati sāmicīṃ pravartayati dvitīyo vā dvitīye,
V03vinv16_u:1392: evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ tṛṇaprastāraka adhikaraṇaśamatho [Adhik-v_110] bhavati;
V03vinv16_u:1393: evaṃ ca punar ihaikeṣām adhikaraṇānāṃ damaś ca bhavati śamāś ca vyupaśamaś ca yaduta tṛṇaprastārakeṇa ḥadhikaraṇaḥśamathena
V03vinv16_u:1394: āpattyādhikaraṇaṃ bhikṣavaḥ ebhiś caturbhir adhikaraṇaśamathair dharmair damayitavyaṃ śamayitavyaṃ vyupaśamayitavyam,
V03vinv16_u:1396: kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ tu bhikṣavaḥ samagreṇa saṃghena vyupaśamayitavyam
V03vinv16_u:1397: yasmin bhikṣavaḥ āvāse eko bihikṣuḥ prativasati tatra na kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1398: yasmin dvau tatrāpi na kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ ḥvigrahoḥ vivādaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1399: ḥyasmin trayaḥ tatrāpi na kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:1400: ḥ yasmin tu catvāro bhikṣavaḥ prativasanti uttare vā tatra kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaś ca; yathāpi bhikṣavaḥ
